The "Multi Manual Finance Transaction" form now has an extra validation preventing saving, when the decimals on the amounts does not correspond to the digits on the corresponding currency.
After this change the missing FX rates will be reported correctly.
The code that uploads data for MTM status codes for the Trade Manager should check whether the domain dGST is installed.

Fixed scaling of MC shocks for RFs with absolute return for Random By Factor generator.
The ordering of the calculation engine results is corrected to be based on the holding keys.
CustomerApplyNote: The ordering of the calculation engine results is corrected to be based on the holding keys.

ChangeNote: Code changes to calculate rounded dirty value when Round Amount Per Contract tick box is ticked for Asset Manager
Fixed the crash on creating a LoadPlan for a DWH Model having semicolon-separated list of values for the ExpireDeletedRecords Configuration Parameter
Upload cloning functionality for SAAM benchmark positions in order to support filtering by Model Portfolio Holding filter

Use custid instead of custname when check
Flaky test ignored
Risk factor Sensitivities with price method ‘Quoted price + yield curve, str prod’  ignore OAS for Callable bonds.

The 'Generic Decomposition - Upload Results' batch job produces fund decomposition data for the Investment Analytics Platform. The solution was flawed in the scenario where a component moves out of the fund, e.g. in case of a sell transaction. In this case, the market value SOD and cash flow SOD values that corresponds to the "moves out" would appear on the residual instead of on the component itself.

The problem has been solved by enhancing the 'Generic Decomposition - Upload Results' batch job, so it produces a data record for the component on the day it moves out. The record has SOD and EOD weights equal to zero to dictate that the component moves out. With this additional data record, the market value SOD and cash flow SOD values appear on the component itself, thus resulting in a better decomposition.

Please note that existing data in the Investment Analytics Platform will not be impacted by this correction. A new 'Generic Decomposition - Upload Results' is needed for this correction to impact the results in the Investment Analytics Platform.
Flaky test ignored
The base data files are being overwritten for each iteration of the loop when running a "Performance Calculation - Upload Results" batch job. Error was fixed.
OneLib CMSSO: Fix boundary issue for OAS price calibration [26.01]

Amounts for benchmark groups are calculated incorrectly. In case if a security is in several benchmarks and (accordingly) benchmark holding groups, it's total amount was populated to all the groups without distributing it in accordance with the actual amount weights. This has been fixed.
Fixed the joins based 24.04 version and change source of fields ASSRESULT and CMPLRESULT
Flaky test ignored
Add Portfolio free code 6 to popup dialog
Benchmark Purpose & BM from 'Benchmark Assignment'not to be selectable in Model Maintenance
Update of RVP tests (internal)
Sensitivity FIPA effects hierarchy information was added to metadata file.
Filter out non-IMS test runs from flaky test reporting
Revert changes made for processing parentheses in the value property of <setvalue> CDL statement
Add more explicit searching transactions condition
Fixed a recently introduced issue where identical entries in the bank log caused incorrect calculation of the Bank Account holding in the Portfolio calculation.
Correction of incorrect Date latest coupon behavior in the Nominal framework for increment
Add project version to npm audit report title
Extra validation added to series symbol and full symbol for future rolling. Now we also check the characters are uppercase and that the full symbol ends with a digit.
Added -autrole and -pmg to list of acceptable command line arguments
Create data import for the Generic Risk Factor Sensitivity window
Adding simulation macros to SST
Added PFCSUBLOPENPMT table to Position Open Payment Fact in IMW
Changes to internal tests, no impact on business logic.
MSCI, ExchTraded model: fetched Settlement price for the Bond/Euity Forward in case when it is a fund component. And replace pCLEAN with pCLEANUND
A program error occurred when loading a record using a deleted reference date. This has been corrected.

The portfolio calculation did not include a bank account position having a zero balance on the first calculation date, but a non-zero balance on the last calculation date. The problem was that a cost/tax payment in the bank account had a cost payment date prior to its transaction agreement date; while the last portfolio calculation date was later than the cost payment date, but prior to the transaction agreement date. The zero-position check in the portfolio calculation did not find such payments. The error has been corrected for both bank accounts and cash buckets.
Making Calculate average execution time event compatible with schedule.
Add explicit portfolio group fetch for Message Queue messages processing
Once a second done adjustment exists on the TRS basket, no more adjustment could be added. This was fixed in the Trade Manager.
Fix error message in "Front office model - Execute" batch job
Corrected name of group totals title for Deviations in result monitor applet
DWH: Fixed database field overflow when serializing flow events
A program error occurred when using  'Start Batch Job Group' in the 'Batch Monitor'. this has been corrected.

It is client specific code to introduce a check to ensure that when the MDV event is seen to be ready, it truly does not have any un-validated unfinished MDV events linked to the fund. When there are un-validated unfinished MDV events, then STP process allows rules that fail but have an error level of warning to skip the check and allow the validation to continue. An extra information is logged for further investigation.
New file extensions have been whitelisted for SCDWeb. And         started to display error message instead throwing the error if we call the code inside.
The change is not relevant for clients. It handles the timeout issues with internal testing pipeline (RVP).
fix modules audit
Add additional condition for finding linked parcels - if system found the original parcel - finish the search and move to other parcel
Calculation definitions - main buffer updated with validation status along with base filter updated with these fields.
Added Simulation_ID field to all pairs of instrument type + transaction type, which support the creation of simulations.  Simulations can be updated via the OTC Web Api using PUT requests.
Update of internal SimCorp tool, which does not affect any customer installations
Performance optimization when handling many aux jobs.
Customer specific fix to reduce the size of compliance pre-trade results.
Insert error message on missing ISIN at WM owner pool
Added optional  floatOffset tag to the GenericBondModel, overnightIndexedCoupons section
Return error if too many decimals in import data
Increase a regex timeout for analyzing complex rules and fragments while validation
After UP source code move some assemblies are missing from bundle
Handle race condition when closing sessions in AzureLoadTest
AIP IMW tables adjustments and 3 new tables added. Prefix changed from BF to BR
Do not recalculate FRA/IRF price if it is given as input.
Fix a bug with Data Warehouse Web API Data Source Editor where compilation was not possible on some environments
Collateral Manager: Accrued interest on Collateral/Market/Available positions is calculated based on the calculation date plus the allocation days.
"Open folder" button on the Order Outbox ribbon had no image with Large resolution. This has now been corrected.
Removed arbitrary limit of at most showing 10000 rows in all Trade Manager search applets.
The composition of the inflation curve when "Include CPI values" = true has been corrected such that the lag defined on the RPI on the contract is correctly taken into account.
Fixed redemption payment date for callable bonds if call/put option is applied and option date falls on a holiday.
Elementary transaction components with message status ‘Rescheduled’ or ‘Error’ can safely be set 'On Hold' and should not be categorized as invalid.

The compliance service only request the pricing and key ratios service to calculate/return values for user definable key ratios (UDKRs) that are in use in compliance. There was a problem in the in-use detection in pre-trade test checks, if the UDKR was only used on a draft rule. This has been resolved.

Structured ABSs incorrectly used future Pool Factors in valuation. 

And in general bond options did not take effects analysis date into account for the underlying bond.
Fix a crash in processing CDS index transactions on  STP transaction status service.
A database error occurred when executing the batch task  'Performance Calculation - Upload Results'. this has been corrected.
Added available memory check before looking for N*M match combinations to avoid WS FULL errors.
Added Simulation_ID field to all pairs of instrument type + transaction type, which support the creation of simulations.  Simulations can be updated via the OTC Web Api using PUT requests.

An error could occur in the 'Portfolio Calculation' in case 'Adjustment frequency' was not set to ''No adj.' and in case at least one 'Hedge' position with Hedge adjustment' 'Freeze' and 'Hedge risk free price adjustment method' 'Dollar offset - Retrospective (constant spread and curve)' was supposed to be calculated. This has been fixed.
In some situations, Oracle chose a wrong execution plan leading to a very bad performance for the ‘Initialising – Building keys...’ step. This has been corrected.
The database load generated by the message queue service when looking for messages to process has been reduced.
In Fund definitions; copying a fund certificate should not create a new entry on class fund. This issue has now been fixed.
Form "Central Trade Manager". The issue when the menu item "Send  Reject Message" was always enabled if an Alleged Message and an ordinary transaction are selected has been fixed.
Allow OTC Web API query HasOrderSupport for the given instrument in the installation where it runs, rather than determining order support statically
Made "Side" values consistent in responses between data retrieval Pretrade API v3 endpoints
The sub tab "Change Portfolio Booking Date" on the "Portfolio" -> "Extra Information" -> "Info" is now hidden. No change in user functionality.
Optimize code finding client benchmark from model portfolio.
Corrected request examples in Swagger for Pretrade API CreateContingencyBegin endpoint

The query used to find cash bucket positions/movements when using Period Closure has been optimized.
Technical: 
- An existing index on table TRANSSUBLRPDATES has been changed (extra column added). 
Updating this index during upgrade may take some time.
- Hint has been added to force Oracle to use the correct index on table TRANSSUBLEDGER

When technical transactions are generated for cash bucket and bank accounts on nominal framework, the subsequent P/L framework is impacted and generating technical transaction on the same day for  P/L framework gets incorrect figures for balance fields (QC/PC). This change fixes this issue.
An error could occur when one GCA framework was installed in the SCD installation and all GCA values were 0 on the transaction. This has bene fixed.
To improve the performance of the validation when saving US pool static data, a new index has been created on IBI.POOLNO.
Reduce the database load (table SECBUSCLASSTS) when loading Parties.
Reduce the database load generated by the Collateral dashboard service by optimizing SQL statements.

Reduce the database resources used when saving Data Warehouse information during the save of Performance Reports results (Oracle table PERFREPDELNODEINFO). The change will only affect customers having Data Warehouse installed.
Implemented missing condition for standalone portfolio
Removed vulnerable packages from apigw
Empty portal schema should be threated as an error
